name: @fex-to/provider-icons-webp
description: A set of provider icons in WebP format with multiple sizes (128x128, 256x256, 512x512).
author: dejurin

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:license && npm run build:icons
scripts.clean: rm -rf icons && mkdir -p icons/128 && mkdir -p icons/256 && mkdir -p icons/512
